author: jroloff
body:
#### PR description:

This MR adds a DQM framework for particle flow candidates. Currently, the framework is focused on dijet topologies, but the eventual aim is to extend this to other event selections as well. 

#### PR validation:

This code has been used for studies shown in the PF and PPD meetings ([https://indico.cern.ch/event/1437831/](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1437831/)), with results that look reasonable. I have also run the basic code quality checks for CMSSW.
title: Adding code for Particle Flow DQM
